vote.title: To honor, recognize and celebrate Steven Gladman on his distinguished 15 year career with the Affordable Housing Trust
vote.description:
Title
To honor, recognize and celebrate Steven Gladman on his distinguished 15 year career with the Affordable Housing Trust
 
Body
WHEREAS, the Affordable Housing Trust for Columbus and Franklin County, established in 2001, is an independent, non-profit lender that works with the private, non-profit and public sectors to develop affordable housing opportunities within the City of Columbus and Franklin County; and                     
                     
WHEREAS, we are here today to express our appreciation to Steven Gladman and honor him for his distinguished 15-year career with the Affordable Housing Trust for Columbus and Franklin County and dedicated service to the community; and                     
                     
WHEREAS, Steve began his career with the Affordable Housing Trust for Columbus and Franklin County  on October 16, 2006, serving as President and CEO; and                      
                     
WHEREAS, He has lead AHT through significant growth, from $11 million in total assets in 2006, to over $91 million in total assets today; and                     
                     
WHEREAS, His collaborative efforts lead to the creation of the $100 million Housing Action Fund, which addresses the further need for affordable housing in Franklin County; now, therefore;                     
 
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: To honor, recognize and celebrate Steven Gladman on his distinguished 15 year career with the Affordable Housing Trust
